post.author: Eugeny
post.body:
Dear friends, I am pleased to present to you the glad our project «Users MOD».
The idea ofcreating a new upgraded version WolfMP born and nurtured in our minds for a long time, but the plans were conceived only take a couple of months ago. The main idea was that the players once again plunged into the familiar atmosphere of the game for them and have experienced themselves as fighters of the two opposing armies, but the gameplay could not leave them indifferent to our offspring.

Had to spend a lot of time and effort to create new characters. At the very beginning we have been experimenting with the standard set, but then we had to give it up. Too outdated typical person pale suits and standard animation required significant improvements and changes. Later we were able to create new images that successfully got used to the game. The diversity of the new animation allowed to add a touch of humor, diversify and improve the quality gameplay. The singularity of a set of related movements of the characters - the main feature, which we have emphasized throughout the project. Set of arms has also undergone some significant changes. Thus, the German MP-40 machine gun was replaced by the new MP-44, and instead of the American infantry machine brand, we decided to use a Thompson submachine gun Soviet Shpagina (PPSh-41), Sten and other small arms have not changed. New animation of weapons, grenades and bullets flying Faust makes the game more enjoyable and interesting.

Qualitative scoring of the Russian and English language made it possible to already not boring characters more lively in the game and create a special sound atmosphere, music fans will be waiting a little musical surprise. A selection of the cards that are adapted for online play will be different from the standard set in the old WolfMP and will allow players to enjoy the game play, and a few new tasks for the team will make it Neskuchny and diverse. Game format will remain the same, "the battle for the object," "death match" and "capture the flag".

The main menu of the game, the player selection panel / weapons, and much more will be different from the old. At the same time of the game has not lost its specific style, and will get a new form and it will be convenient to use.

Andrey Dobroslov (:Exe/C0br@)
